fulltext:
Hoang Huu Pham
Software Developer
OVERVIEW
| am a mobile & backend developer, having 8 years of experience in the software industry with the desire of
building great products from the ground up. Being in many roles: developer, solution architect, team leader, I have
helped companies built successful products with great feedback from partners and clients.
Expertise in these domains below:
- Mobile messenger application.
- Video streaming system: HLS Streaming, Multi-DRM system, Transcoder & Packager, Media Player.
- Mobile app development: iOS native & hybrid using Objective-C, Swift, PhoneGap, React Native.
- NodeJS, PHP RESTful API.
- Adobe Flash, HTML5 Animation, AR Game.
iOS (7 years), Javascript (5 years), Backend (4 years), React Native (2 years), .NET (1 year)
WORK EXPERIENCES
Senior Developer
East Agile (2018 - Present)
Senior Developer
FPT Software (2017 - 2018)
Tech lead
VTVcab Corp (2013 - 2017)
Developer
VIMASS (2012 - 2013)
Intern & Developer
PPCLink Mobile & VTC Game Studio (2010 - 2012)
EDUCATION
Hanoi University of Science &
0
Bachelor of Computer Science - Bridge Software Engineer (BrSE)
Technology
Study at HEDSPI (Human Higher Education Development Support Project
Oct 2006 - May 2011
on ICT) a cooperation in ICT training between HUST and Japanese
universities.
PROJECTS
BBM Messenger
Senior iOS Developer
2018 - 2019
BBM was formerly the messenger application of BlackBerry. It was later bought by
Emtek Indonesia (East Agile's client) with the ambition to become the most
popular messenger in Indonesia.
/ joined a team of 3 engineers to revamp the UI of emoticons keyboard and
stickers shop screens. Then I worked with other team of 8 engineers to migrate the
existing File sharing infrastructure to the new one, focused on reducing the File
uploading error rate, and implemented new features like File preview, Photo
editing, etc...
Technologies used: Objective-C, Reactive Cocoa, Swift, CoreData, SQLite
OCMock, MVVM Clean Architecture, Fabric crashlytic, Firebase.
Aviator
0
Senior iOS Developer
2017 - 2018
Aviator is a big offshore project between FPT Software and a US aircraft
company. We helped the client to build a kind of allin-one tablet application from
scratch, supports iPad and Surface Pro, provides centralized access to a
seamless, integrated suite of EFB tools.
/ joined a group of 40 iOS developer and tester, organized by following the client's
SAFe Agile framework. Our Weather scrum team includes 5 developers and 4
testers, worked closely to optimize the Weather dashboard UI performance,
integrated the proprietary flight map & chart SDK and implemented the weather
data regex parser.
Technologies used: Swif, MVVM Clean Architecture.
Homi
Freelance iOS Developer
2017
Homi is an ioSs application provides parents and school staff a set of tools: student
schedule management, attendance tracking, school fee reminder, learning
progress tracking and reporting.
I worked with another engineer to develop the app from scratch using React
Native.
Technologies used: React Native, Objective-C, Redux, Fabric.
VTVcab ON
Tech Lead - Software Engineer
2013 - 2017
VTVcab ON is a Multi-screen DRM protected video streaming service of VTVcab.
Joined project from the beginning as a technical leader, I had worked closely with
many partners in APAc Video industry, to build up the overall system architecture
of our streaming service, includes Video transcoder & packager, Storage,
Metadata ingesting, DRM, CDN, web service, mobile app, and front-end. Took on
many roles:
+ Technical planning
+ Solution architect
+ Mobile iOS Developer
+ Web Developer
+ System engineer
Technologies used: Python, Docker, MEAN stack, Laravel, MySQL, React Native,
Objective-C, AFNetworking, RestKit, CoreData, Fabric crashlytic, CodePush.
Awarded for Outstanding performer in 2016
AR Game
Developer
2013
This is a cross-platform Augmented Reality 3D Game, developed for Galaxy
Studio JSC, to support the ticket giveaway event of their viral campaign of "The
Amazing Spider-man 2" movie. The gameplay requires the user to walk outside at
the specific location, use the phone camera to look around for a flying card, then
capture it for exchange for small gifts, movie tickets. It was downloaded 45000
times, thousands of active players.
I built both client and backend using Laravel and hybrid mobile framework.
Technologies used: Phonegap, Cocos3D iOS, jPCT-AE 3D, Objective-C, Java,
Laravel PHP, MySQL
VIMASS E-wallet
0
Developer
2012 - 2013
VIMAss is a mobile payment service, launched earlier than many competitors at
that time. It also includes many useful features like finding nearby ATM,
Restaurant, Hotel, etc..
/ joined the iOS team of 4 developers, developed Google Maps based features.
Then I moved to Windows Phone team to refactor and apply MVVM to the existing
code base, implemented iOS corresponding features and a High-resolution photo
cropping tool.
Technologies used: Objective-C, AFNetworking, .NET, LightMVVM, Ninject,
SQLite.

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
